text.text: THE OFFICE OF THE ORGANIZING COMMITTEEIS LOCATED IN OLYMPIC HOTEL。
(第一届东亚运动会)组委会地址在奥林匹克俱乐部。
Mr.Lee:I haven't seen you for a long time.Are youevery busy?
李先生:好久没见到你了，最近很忙吗?
Ms Wang: Yes, I'm working part time.at OlympicHotel.
王小姐:对，我在奥林匹克宾馆兼职。
Mr.Lee:At olympic Hotel?What' s your position?
李先生:在奥林匹克宾馆?什么职位?
Ms Wang: Oh, you must be mistaken.I mean I'm your position?actually working for the Organizing Committee of theFiret East Asian Games.
王小姐:噢，你弄错了，我是说我在替第一届东亚运动会组委会工作。
Mr.lee oh, I see.The office of rhe OrganixingCommittee is located in Olympic Hotel?
李先生:噢，我明白了，组委会办公地点在奥林匹克宾馆。
